scripts.predev:ssr: pnpm run sync:resume && pnpm run prune:artifacts
scripts.test:unit: cross-env ENABLE_BROWSER_TESTS=false VITE_DISABLE_HMR=1 vitest run --pool threads
scripts.test:ui:container: mkdir -p .playwright/node_modules && ENABLE_BROWSER_TESTS=true PLAYWRIGHT_BROWSERS=${PLAYWRIGHT_BROWSERS:-chromium,firefox,webkit} PLAYWRIGHT_UID=$(id -u) PLAYWRIGHT_GID=$(id -g) docker compose -f docker-compose.playwright.yml run --rm playwright --config vitest.playwright.config.ts
scripts.test:accessibility:container: if [ "$SKIP_GENERATE" != "1" ]; then pnpm generate; fi && PLAYWRIGHT_UID=0 PLAYWRIGHT_GID=0 ENABLE_BROWSER_TESTS=true PLAYWRIGHT_BROWSERS=${PLAYWRIGHT_BROWSERS:-chromium} docker compose -f docker-compose.playwright.yml run --rm -e SKIP_GENERATE=1 playwright bash -lc 'bash ./scripts/install-playwright-deps.sh && chown pwuser:pwuser /workspace && chmod 777 /workspace && mkdir -p /workspace/test-results /workspace/reports /workspace/.lighthouseci && chown -R pwuser:pwuser /workspace/test-results /workspace/reports /workspace/.lighthouseci && chmod -R 777 /workspace/test-results /workspace/reports /workspace/.lighthouseci && su pwuser -c "cd /workspace && pnpm test:accessibility:ci"; status=$?; node ./scripts/cleanup-playwright-workdir.mjs; exit $status'
scripts.pw: if [ "$SKIP_GENERATE" != "1" ]; then pnpm generate; fi && PLAYWRIGHT_UID=0 PLAYWRIGHT_GID=0 ENABLE_BROWSER_TESTS=true PLAYWRIGHT_BROWSERS=${PLAYWRIGHT_BROWSERS:-chromium,firefox,webkit} docker compose -f docker-compose.playwright.yml run --rm -e SKIP_GENERATE=1 playwright bash -lc 'bash ./scripts/install-playwright-deps.sh && chown pwuser:pwuser /workspace && chmod 777 /workspace && mkdir -p /workspace/test-results /workspace/reports /workspace/.lighthouseci && chown -R pwuser:pwuser /workspace/test-results /workspace/reports /workspace/.lighthouseci && chmod -R 777 /workspace/test-results /workspace/reports /workspace/.lighthouseci && su pwuser -c "cd /workspace && pnpm test:e2e"; status=$?; node ./scripts/cleanup-playwright-workdir.mjs; exit $status'
scripts.test:performance:container: if [ "$SKIP_GENERATE" != "1" ]; then pnpm generate; fi && PLAYWRIGHT_UID=0 PLAYWRIGHT_GID=0 docker compose -f docker-compose.playwright.yml run --rm -e SKIP_GENERATE=1 playwright bash -lc 'bash ./scripts/install-playwright-deps.sh && chmod 777 /workspace && mkdir -p /workspace/test-results /workspace/reports /workspace/.lighthouseci && chmod -R 777 /workspace/test-results /workspace/reports /workspace/.lighthouseci && cd /workspace && pnpm test:performance; status=$?; if [ $status -eq 0 ]; then node ./scripts/update-lighthouse-badge.mjs; fi; node ./scripts/cleanup-playwright-workdir.mjs; chmod -R 777 /workspace/docs/badges || true; exit $status'
scripts.prebuild: pnpm run sync:resume && pnpm exec nuxi prepare
scripts.predev: pnpm run sync:resume && pnpm run prune:artifacts
